nodes.body: {!header} May has been packed with hits ones after another! We started out with [painting Plorps](https://www.instagram.com/p/DJemOngx95O/?img_index=1) and haven't slowed down with our [Spring Jam](https://itch.io/jam/stlgamedev-spring-jam) concluding this week!
{üì∞ news} Playstation [showcased a deep dive](https://blog.playstation.com/2025/04/29/watch-the-borderlands-4-gameplay-deep-dive-state-of-play-on-april-30/) on the upcoming Borderlands 4!
{üìö resources} _Scott Petrovic_ made a cool [3D animation tool](https://mesh2motion.org/) similar to Mixamo
{üéÆ releases} _Simple Pixel Games_ released [Word Scores](https://store.steampowered.com/app/3340020/Word_Scores/), a relaxing casual strategy word game, on Steam!

{üéÆ releases} _Limebranch_ released [Missouri Riverbank Restorer](https://limebranch.itch.io/mrr) on itch.io! Learn about Missouri rivers and the native flora and fauna as you progress through several minigames!
{üì¢ announcements} There will be no Audio Club this month, but feel free to post your work to the #audio channel in the [Discord](https://discord.gg/D2Khxsgj)!

{üìö resources} [The 20 Games Challenge](https://20_games_challenge.gitlab.io/challenge/) is a way to challenge yourself to program complex games over time. What elements are needed to recreate Jetpack Joyride?
{üìö resources} Detective Fantasia made an excellent tech breakdown of their [pixelated ocean](https://bsky.app/profile/detfantasia.bsky.social/post/3lmxfkuym7c27)

{üïπÔ∏è updates} _Tony Wojnar_ continues work on _Dribble 2_ by adding more cute underwater enemies like this [Inflatable Pufferfish](https://bsky.app/profile/tonywojnar.bsky.social/post/3lpeuvjhwvc2f) and [Scuba Bizbot](https://bsky.app/profile/tonywojnar.bsky.social/post/3lpwp5ui5bc2c)!
{üéÆ releases} _neitherw0rld_'s epic MegaMan64 style music video for _Sohlaroids'_ [Fight or Flight](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SjSddinwFpM) is finally out!

{üïπÔ∏è updates} _Colorgrave_ is hard at work on [April Grove](https://store.steampowered.com/app/3622260/April_Grove/), a cozy casual lumberjack experience. It is planned to release next month. Wishlist it now on Steam!
{üïπÔ∏è updates} _Soobly_ is continuing work on his PSX-inspired horror game, [Ascent](https://bsky.app/profile/s00bly.bsky.social/post/3lpkgpswlf22r)

{üïπÔ∏è updates} _Kris Truitt_ finished up some [killer key art](https://bsky.app/profile/kristruitt.bsky.social/post/3loyd6zedsc26) for his game [Mansion of a Million Monsters](https://store.steampowered.com/app/3627210/Mansion_of_a_Million_Monsters/)

{üì∞ news} Microsoft Announces [Retro Classics With Game Pass](https://www.ign.com/articles/microsoft-announces-retro-classics-with-game-pass-kicks-things-off-with-over-50-activision-games-from-the-80s-and-90s), reviving a collection of over 50 classic Activision games

{üìö resources} Lu Gossian designed a [one-page game design document template](https://www.lugossian.com/gdd-1-page-template-download) perfect for planning out jam games and smaller game development projects

events.title: Spring Game Jam
events.description:
Team up with local creators and make a game over a few weekends (and the week in between)! This jam will be mostly virtual. SIGN UP ON ITCH.IO!

For full details, including the address, and to RSVP see:¬†https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/307433670/

events.title: Game Club: Baba Is You
events.description:
Game Club is like a book club except we pick a game to play each month and then meet up to discuss it with a focus on game design. This month's game is Baba Is You, a brilliant puzzle game! Come share your thoughts on the game with us!

For full details, including the address, and to RSVP see:¬†https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/307697799/
events.location: QDOBA Mexican Eats, 766 N New Ballas Rd, Creve Coeur, MO 63141, USA

events.title: Spring Jam Work Session 2
events.description:
The Spring Game Jam is virtual, but we decided to have an in-person get together anyway. Come hang out with fellow jammers and work on your games at the library! We will be in Meeting Room 2.

For full details, including the address, and to RSVP see:¬†https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/307824136/
events.location: St. Louis County Library Grand Glaize Branch  - 1010 Meramec Station Rd - Manchester, MO, us

events.title: Spring Jam Game Demos
events.description: Spring Jam game demos will be streamed live online on our Twitch channel

events.title: Share & Play
events.description:
Join us for casual game testing! This is an opportunity for developers to share their progress, observe playtesting, and get feedback on their projects, and for local game enthusiasts to get their hands on new games, prototypes, and give helpful feedback. We will be in Meeting Room 2 in the library.

For full details, including the address, and to RSVP see: https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/307697634/

events.title: Dev Night Out @ Puttshack!
events.description:
Join fellow game developers on June 21st as we conquer Puttshack, a new concept of mini golf with patented technology, world-class dining and high-energy vibes!¬† After, we will discuss what criticisms we have with this location-based entertainment and what we would change given the chance!


For full details, including the address, and to RSVP see: https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/308068741
events.location: Puttshack  - 3730 Foundry Way Suite 100,  - St Louis, MO, US
